body:
Lars,

I wrote a little Perl script some time ago, to help out a student
who wanted to batch-correct the exposure info in HDRs. The script is
available here:

http://www.luxal.eu/resources/hdr/hdrexpo/index.shtml

It's called hdrexpo. Feel free to use it as a base for for your own HDR
header manipulation, if you're happy to stick to the GPL license. I'd be
happy to put in your changes.

Axel
